name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Samuel CAIN, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Samuel CAIN, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Judgment of Sentence is Affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Kenneth Gallant, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
441 A.2d 1213
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Samuel CAIN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 22, 1982.
Decided March 10, 1982.
David Rudovsky, Philadelphia, (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Kenneth Gallant, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
